public class EnglishLemmatizer
extends Lemmatizer

Implements a lemmatizer for English nouns

public java.lang.String Lemmatize(java.lang.String term)

esEnding

private boolean esEnding(char beforelast,
                         char last)
Method esEnding words with this end letters make plural with -es these are the words ending in x and o and the words ending in -ch, -zz, -sh or -ss

consonant

private boolean consonant(char b)
Method consonant Checks if a letter is a consonant. A letter is a consonant if it's not a vowel.

vowel

private boolean vowel(char b)
Method vowel Checks if a letter is a vowel. A letter is a vowel if it is a, e, i, o or u (y is not considered a vowel here).

isException

private java.lang.String isException(java.lang.String term)
Method isException If a word is an irregular plural the corresponding singular form is returned else 'null' is returned
